utils

Class DAOUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.DAOUtil

  • public final class DAOUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for DAO's. This class contains commonly used DAO logic which is been refactored in single static methods. As far it contains a PreparedStatement values setter and a java.util.Date to java.sql.Date converter.
    Author:
    Ahmed Gamal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • prepareStatement

        public static java.sql.PreparedStatement prepareStatement(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                                          java.lang.String sql,
                                                          boolean returnGeneratedKeys,
                                                          java.lang.Object... values)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a PreparedStatement of the given connection, set with the given SQL query and the given parameter values.
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection to create the PreparedStatement from.
        sql - The SQL query to construct the PreparedStatement with.
        returnGeneratedKeys - Set whether to return generated keys or not.
        values - The parameter values to be set in the created PreparedStatement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If something fails during creating the PreparedStatement.

      • setValues

        public static void setValues(java.sql.PreparedStatement statement,
                             java.lang.Object... values)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Set the given parameter values in the given PreparedStatement.
        Parameters:
        connection - The PreparedStatement to set the given parameter values in.
        values - The parameter values to be set in the created PreparedStatement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - If something fails during setting the PreparedStatement values.
